content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Maryam. However, due to our different negotiation approaches, I prefer discussing this opportunity only with individuals who share my business style. I'm sorry but I don't want to continue the negotiation with you on this particular apartment, as it's vital for me to secure the highest possible price. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
